channel.title: New Black Mesa Trailer and Wallpapers.
channel.description:
Hey guys. As some of you know, I spent the last week or 2 working on a nice trailer, Well, it's finally here. :smiley:
So I felt really good about this trailer, I decided it was worth making some wallpapers from it too.
Also, Special thanks to Hamst3r for making [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=1390']Chaos Out Of Nothingness[/url] especially for this trailer.
Now..
The trailer is here: [url='https://www.youtube.com/user/SimBoy48']My Youtube Page[/url] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T34-h4_mCZM&eurl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fuser%2FSimBoy48&feature=player_profilepage#t=60']Or Here[/url]
Wallpapers are coming soon. :smiley:

item.title: New Black Mesa Trailer and Wallpapers.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
I almost did.
I actually am busy doing my Independent Film if no-one forgot.

I do want to do it though.
My best thing is to make a mock up of the new Coca Cola advert in Gmod.

Read full topic

item.title: New Black Mesa Trailer and Wallpapers.
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
As far a fancy looks go, the trailer was pretty nice.

The cheap anime-style sliding key frame style is what really stinks. It’s just a really lousy way to fake dephty camera movement.
